name: cms125v14_breast_cancer_screening
description: CMS125v14 Breast Cancer Screening - Clinical Quality Measure for women 42-74 years of age who had a mammogram

protocols.description: Breast Cancer Screening protocol - monitors mammography screening compliance for women aged 42-74

meta.title: Breast Cancer Screening
meta.description: Women 42-74 years of age who have not had a mammogram to screen for breast cancer within the last 27 months.
references: American Cancer Society. 2010. Cancer Facts & Figures 2010. Atlanta: American Cancer Society.
National Business Group on Health. 2011. Pathways to Managing Cancer in the Workplace. Washington: National Business Group on Health.

U.S. Preventive Services Task Force (USPSTF). 2009. 1) "Screening for breast cancer: U.S. Preventive Services Task Force recommendation statement." 2) "December 2009 addendum." Ann Intern Med 151(10):716-726.
